{"id":787926416,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1661944203,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"33 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/787926416/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"20.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n = height.size();\n        vector<int> maxPref(n, height[0]), maxSuff(n, height[n - 1]);\n        for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n            maxPref[i] = max(maxPref[i - 1], height[i]);\n        }\n        for (int i = n - 2; i >= 0; i--) {\n            maxSuff[i] = max(maxSuff[i + 1], height[i]);\n        }\n        int trappedWater = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            trappedWater += max(0, min(maxPref[i], maxSuff[i]) - height[i]);\n        }\n        return trappedWater;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
